subject: Re: [junit] help
msgSnippet: I suggest you read the book Junit in Action , although the book is not yet published but you can get a copy of it online (pdf format) for $20. This is a no
messageBody:
I suggest you read the book "Junit in Action", although the book is not yet published but you can get a copy of it online (pdf format) for $20.

This is a no miss book and answers most of your questions as new user. In my case , it has :) .

The website is www.manning.com

regards,

javalist <myjavalist@...> wrote:
hi all:
I am new user to junit . there is a question confuse me. Whether i must write testcode for a method without return value. If it is necessary ,how to write ? Thanks you.
for example:
public class Demo1
{
private String strName;
public void setName(String str)
{
strName = str;
}
......
}
whether i must use junit to test setName function.
best regards
penpals
